trans-unit.source: Represents an embedded chart in Office projects for Microsoft Office Excel.
trans-unit.target: 表示 Microsoft Office Excel 的 Office 项目中的一个内嵌图表。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> controls provide all the features of native <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Chart?displayProperty=fullName> objects in the Excel object model.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> 控件提供的本机的所有功能<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Chart?displayProperty=fullName>Excel 对象模型中的对象。

trans-unit.source: However, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> controls also expose events.
trans-unit.target: 但是，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>控件还公开了事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Chart Control](/visualstudio/vsto/chart-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[图表控件](/visualstudio/vsto/chart-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 用法

trans-unit.source: Makes the current <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> control the active chart.
trans-unit.target: 使当前 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> 控件成为活动图表。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> control is activated.
trans-unit.target: 在激活 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> 控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> with a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.ActivateEvent> event that displays a message box when the chart is activated.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>的处理程序与<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.ActivateEvent>激活图表时显示一个消息框的事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Application" /> that represents the Microsoft Office Excel application.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Application" />，它表示 Microsoft Office Excel 应用程序。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Application" /> that represents the Excel application.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Application" />，表示 Excel 应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.Application%2A> property to display the application name in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.Application%2A>属性在消息框中显示的应用程序名称。

trans-unit.source: The file name for a chart template.
trans-unit.target: 图表模板的文件名。

trans-unit.source: Applies a standard or custom chart template to the chart.
trans-unit.target: 将标准或自定义图表模板应用于图表。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlDataLabelsType" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlDataLabelsType" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of data label to apply.
trans-unit.target: 要应用的数据标签的类型。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to show the legend key next to the point.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" /> 时，在点旁边显示图例项标示。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the object automatically generates appropriate text based on content.
trans-unit.target: 如果对象自动根据内容生成适当的文本，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: For the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Chart" /> and <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Series" /> objects, <see langword="true" /> if the series has leader lines.
trans-unit.target: 对于 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Chart" /> 和 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Series" /> 对象而言，如果系列包含引导线，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The series name for the data label.
trans-unit.target: 数据标签的系列名称。

trans-unit.source: The category name for the data label.
trans-unit.target: 数据标签的类别名称。

trans-unit.source: The value for the data label.
trans-unit.target: 数据标签的值。

trans-unit.source: The percentage for the data label.
trans-unit.target: 数据标签的百分比。

trans-unit.source: The bubble size for the data label.
trans-unit.target: 数据标签的气泡大小。

trans-unit.source: The separator for the data label.
trans-unit.target: 数据标签的分隔符。

trans-unit.source: Applies data labels to a point, a series, or all the series in a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 将数据标签应用于 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> 控件的某个点、某个系列或所有系列。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.ApplyDataLabels%2A> method to display data labels with the series names on the chart.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.ApplyDataLabels%2A>方法以在图表上显示数据标签与系列名称。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 through 10 that specifies the type of layout to apply to the chart.
trans-unit.target: 1 到 10 之间的一个整数，用于指定要应用于图表的布局的类型。

trans-unit.source: Applies the layouts shown on the Ribbon.
trans-unit.target: 应用功能区上显示的布局。

trans-unit.source: The values of the `Layout` parameter correspond to the available options on the **Chart Layouts** group on the **Design** tab on the Ribbon.
trans-unit.target: 值`Layout`参数对应于可用的选项上**图表布局**组**设计**功能区上的选项卡。

trans-unit.source: The **Design** tab is available when you select a chart.
trans-unit.target: **设计**选项卡选择图表后可用。

trans-unit.source: Each type of chart has its own set of layout options.
trans-unit.target: 每个类型的图表有自己的布局选项集。

trans-unit.source: For example, the layout options for a pie chart are different from the layout options for a column chart.
trans-unit.target: 例如，饼图的布局选项是柱形图的布局选项不同。

trans-unit.source: If you want to apply a layout from a different chart type, you can use the `ChartType` parameter to specify the chart type that the `Layout` parameter will refer to.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要从不同的图表类型应用布局，则可以使用`ChartType`参数来指定图表键入`Layout`参数将引用。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a column chart and you want to apply a layout from a line chart, pass the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlChartType.xlLine?displayProperty=fullName> value to the `ChartType` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你有一个柱形图和你想要从折线图应用布局、 传递<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlChartType.xlLine?displayProperty=fullName>值赋给`ChartType`参数。

trans-unit.source: The layout only adds chart elements that are available for that particular chart type.
trans-unit.target: 布局将只添加可用于该特定的图表类型的图表元素。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information about optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example applies the tenth layout that is available for the chart type of the `Chart_1` chart.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例应用可用于的图表类型的第 10 个布局`Chart_1`图表。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.SetElement%2A> method to apply further layout changes: setting the style of the chart title to be centered and to lie inside the chart grid area, adding a title for the horizontal axis, and adding a rotated title for the vertical axis.
trans-unit.target: 此外，该示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.SetElement%2A>方法应用更多布局更改： 设置图表标题为居中且位于图表网格区域内的样式、 添加的水平轴的标题以及添加垂直轴的旋转的标题。

trans-unit.source: To run this code example, you must add a clustered column two-dimensional chart with the name `Chart_1` to the default sheet `Sheet1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，必须将添加名为簇状的柱形二维图表`Chart_1`默认表`Sheet1`。

trans-unit.source: Scales a 3-D chart so that it is closer in size to the equivalent 2-D chart.
trans-unit.target: 缩放三维图表，以使其在大小上更接近等效的二维图表。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Microsoft Office Excel scales a 3-D chart so that it is closer in size to the equivalent 2-D chart; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Microsoft Office Excel 缩放三维图表，以使其在大小上更接近等效的二维图表，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.RightAngleAxes" /> property must be <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.RightAngleAxes" /> 属性必须为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a 3-D <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> and then sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.AutoScaling%2A> property to `true` to automatically scale the chart.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建一个三维<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>，然后将设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.AutoScaling%2A>属性`true`自动缩放图表。

trans-unit.source: The example sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.RightAngleAxes%2A> property to `true` before the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.AutoScaling%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 该示例设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.RightAngleAxes%2A>属性`true`之前<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.AutoScaling%2A>属性设置。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the axis to return.
trans-unit.target: 指定要返回的轴。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisType" /> constants: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisType.xlValue" />, <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisType.xlCategory" />, or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisType.xlSeriesAxis" /> (<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisType.xlSeriesAxis" /> is valid only for 3-D charts).
trans-unit.target: 可以为以下 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisType" /> 常数之一：<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisType.xlValue" />、<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisType.xlCategory" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisType.xlSeriesAxis" />（<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisType.xlSeriesAxis" /> 只对三维图表有效）。

trans-unit.source: Optional <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: 可选的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisGroup" />。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the axis group.
trans-unit.target: 指定轴组。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, the primary group is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则使用主轴组。

trans-unit.source: 3-D charts have only one axis group.
trans-unit.target: 三维图表只有一个轴组。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents either a single axis or a collection of the axes on the chart.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个对象，该对象表示图表上的一个轴或一个轴集合。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.Axes%2A> method to add a title to the primary axis.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.Axes%2A>方法添加到主轴标题。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents the back wall of a 3-D chart.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个对象，该对象表示三维图表的背面墙。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Walls" /> object that represents the back wall of a 3-D chart.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Walls" /> 对象，表示三维图表的背面墙。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.BackWall%2A> property to format the back wall of a 3-D chart.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.BackWall%2A>后三维图表的墙进行格式设置的属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a 3-D clustered column chart to `Sheet1` and sets its style to style 4.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加到三维簇状的柱形图`Sheet1`并设置其样式为样式 4。

trans-unit.source: The example then creates a range of arbitrary data and sets it as the chart source data.
trans-unit.target: 然后，示例创建的任意数据范围，并将其设置为图表源数据。

trans-unit.source: Next, the code specifies the colors of the chart walls and floor.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，该代码指定图表背景墙和层的颜色。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shape used with the 3-D bar or column chart.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于三维条形或柱形图的形状。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlBarShape" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlBarShape" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a 3-D <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> and then prompts the user to change the bar shape to pyramids by using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.BarShape%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建一个三维<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>然后会提示用户进行更改条形图和棱锥图中使用的形状<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.BarShape%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> control is double-clicked, before the default double-click action.
trans-unit.target: 在双击 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> 控件时，但在默认双击操作之前发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel._Application.DoubleClick%2A> method does not cause this event to occur.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel._Application.DoubleClick%2A>方法不会导致此事件发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> with a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.BeforeDoubleClick> event that displays a message box when an axis of the chart is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>的处理程序与<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.BeforeDoubleClick>时显示一个消息框轴的图表的事件是双击。

trans-unit.source: The example also sets the `Cancel` parameter of the event handler to `true` so that the chart does not receive the double click action when the user double-clicks an axis.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还将`Cancel`的事件处理程序参数`true`，以便图表不会收到双击操作，当用户双击轴。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> control is right-clicked, before the default right-click action.
trans-unit.target: 在右击 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> 控件时，但在默认右击操作之前发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> with a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.BeforeRightClick> event that displays a message box when the chart is right-clicked.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>的处理程序与<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.BeforeRightClick>右击图表时显示一个消息框的事件。

trans-unit.source: The example also sets the `Cancel` parameter of the event handler to `true` so that the chart does not receive the right click action.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还将`Cancel`的事件处理程序参数`true`，因此图表不会收到右键单击操作。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> control plots new or changed data.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> 控件绘制新的或更改的数据后发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> with a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.Calculate> event that displays a message box when the source data of the chart changes.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>的处理程序与<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.Calculate>图表的源数据更改时显示一个消息框的事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartArea" /> object that represents the complete chart area for the chart.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartArea" /> 对象，该对象表示图表的完整图表区域。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartArea" /> object that represents the complete chart area for the chart.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartArea" /> 对象，表示图表的完整图表区域。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.ChartArea%2A> property to modify the weight and color of the chart area border.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.ChartArea%2A>属性修改的权重和图表区边框的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The chart group number.
trans-unit.target: 图表组编号。

trans-unit.source: Gets either a single chart group (a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartGroup" /> object) or a collection of all the chart groups in the chart (a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartGroups" /> object).
trans-unit.target: 获取单个图表组（<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartGroup" /> 对象）或图表中所有图表组的集合（<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartGroups" /> 对象）。

trans-unit.source: Either a single chart group (a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartGroup" /> object) or a collection of all the chart groups in the chart (a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartGroups" /> object).
trans-unit.target: 单个图表组（<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartGroup" /> 对象）或图表中所有图表组的集合（<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartGroups" /> 对象）。

trans-unit.source: The returned collection includes every type of group.
trans-unit.target: 返回的集合包括所有类型的组。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a column <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.ChartGroups%2A> method to modify the space between the columns.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建一个列<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.ChartGroups%2A>方法来修改列之间的空间。

trans-unit.source: The name or number of the chart.
trans-unit.target: 图表的名称或编号。

trans-unit.source: This argument can be an array, to specify more than one chart.
trans-unit.target: 此参数可以是一个数组，以指定多个图表。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents either a single embedded chart (a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartObject" /> object) or a collection of all the embedded charts (a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartObjects" /> object) on the sheet.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个对象，该对象表示工作表上的单个嵌入式图表（<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartObject" /> 对象）或所有嵌入式图表的集合（<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartObjects" /> 对象）。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents either a single embedded chart (a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartObject" /> object) or a collection of all the embedded charts (a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartObjects" /> collection) on the sheet.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，表示工作表上的单个嵌入式图表（<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartObject" /> 对象）或所有嵌入式图表的集合（<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartObjects" /> 集合）。

trans-unit.source: This method is not equivalent to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Workbook.Charts%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不是等效于<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Workbook.Charts%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This method returns embedded charts; the `Charts` property returns chart sheets.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回嵌入的图表;`Charts`属性返回图表工作表。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartObject.Chart%2A> property to return the `Chart` object for an embedded chart.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartObject.Chart%2A>属性以返回`Chart`嵌入图表的对象。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.ChartObjects%2A> method to display whether or not the chart was created by Microsoft Office Excel.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.ChartObjects%2A>方法以显示是否由 Microsoft Office Excel 创建图表。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style of the chart.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置图表的样式。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 through 48 that represents the style of the chart.
trans-unit.target: 1 到 48 之间的一个整数，用于表示图表的样式。

trans-unit.source: The values of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.ChartStyle%2A> property correspond to the available options on the **Chart Styles** group on the **Design** tab on the Ribbon.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.ChartStyle%2A>上的属性对应于可用的选项**图表样式**组**设计**功能区上的选项卡。

trans-unit.source: The **Design** tab is available when you select a chart.
trans-unit.target: **设计**选项卡选择图表后可用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a 3-D clustered column chart to `Sheet1` and sets its style to style 4.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加到三维簇状的柱形图`Sheet1`并设置其样式为样式 4。

trans-unit.source: The example then creates a range of arbitrary data and sets it as the chart source data.
trans-unit.target: 然后，示例创建的任意数据范围，并将其设置为图表源数据。

trans-unit.source: Next, the code specifies the colors of the chart walls and floor.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，该代码指定图表背景墙和层的颜色。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartTitle" /> object that represents the title of the specified chart.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartTitle" /> 对象，该对象表示指定图表的标题。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartTitle" /> object that represents the title of the specified chart.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartTitle" /> 对象，表示指定图表的标题。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.ChartTitle%2A> property to modify the font color of the title.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.ChartTitle%2A>属性修改标题的字体颜色。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the chart type.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置图表类型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlChartType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlChartType" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Some chart types are not available for PivotChart reports.
trans-unit.target: 某些图表类型将不可用的数据透视图报表。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a column <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> and then prompts the user to change the chart to a 3-D pie chart by using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.ChartType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建一个列<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>然后会提示用户使用该图表更改为三维饼图<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.ChartType%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The range that contains the source data for the new chart.
trans-unit.target: 包含新图表的源数据的范围。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, Microsoft Office Excel edits the active chart sheet or the selected <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> control on the active worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则 Microsoft Office Excel 编辑活动图表工作表或在活动工作表上选择的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlChartType" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlChartType" />。

trans-unit.source: The chart type.
trans-unit.target: 图表类型。

trans-unit.source: The option number for the built-in autoformats.
trans-unit.target: 内置自动套用格式的选项编号。

trans-unit.source: Can be a number from 1 through 10, depending on the gallery type.
trans-unit.target: 可以是一个 1 到 10 之间的数（取决于库类型）。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, Excel chooses a default value based on the gallery type and data source.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则 Excel 根据库类型和数据源选择默认值。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the data for each series is in rows or columns.
trans-unit.target: 指定每个系列的数据是按行绘制还是按列绘制。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol" /> constants: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol.xlRows" /> or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol.xlColumns" />.
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol" /> 常数之一：<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol.xlRows" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol.xlColumns" />。

trans-unit.source: An integer specifying the number of rows or columns within the source range that contain category labels.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，指定源范围中包含类别标签的行数或列数。

trans-unit.source: Legal values are from 0 (zero) through one less than the maximum number of the corresponding categories or series.
trans-unit.target: 合法值是从 0（零）到相应类别或系列的最大数减一。

trans-unit.source: An integer specifying the number of rows or columns within the source range that contain series labels.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，指定源范围中包含系列标签的行数或列数。

trans-unit.source: Legal values are from 0 (zero) through one less than the maximum number of the corresponding categories or series.
trans-unit.target: 合法值是从 0（零）到相应类别或系列的最大数减一。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include a legend.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" /> 时包含图例。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> control title text.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> 控件标题文本。

trans-unit.source: The category axis title text.
trans-unit.target: 分类轴标题文本。

trans-unit.source: The value axis title text
trans-unit.target: 数值轴标题文本

trans-unit.source: The series axis title for 3-D charts or the second value axis title for 2-D charts.
trans-unit.target: 三维图表的系列轴标题或二维图表的第二个数值轴标题。

trans-unit.source: Modifies the properties of the given <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 修改给定 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> 控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to quickly format a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> control without setting all the individual properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法可以快速地对 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> 控件进行格式设置，而无需逐个设置所有属性。

trans-unit.source: This method is non-interactive, and it changes only the specified properties.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是非交互式的，它只更改指定的属性。

trans-unit.source: If `Source` is omitted and either the selection is not an embedded chart on the active worksheet or the active sheet is not an existing chart, this method fails and an error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Source`省略和任何一种选择不是在活动工作表或在活动工作表上的嵌入的图表不是现有图表，此方法将失败，发生错误。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.ChartWizard%2A> method to create a 3-D column chart that displays the data series in the range of cells A1 to B5.

trans-unit.source: The file name of the custom dictionary to be examined if the word is not found in the main dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 未在主字典中找到单词时要检查的自定义字典的文件名。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, the currently specified dictionary is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则使用当前指定的字典。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to have Microsoft Office Excel ignore words that are all uppercase.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示使 Microsoft Office Excel 忽略全部大写的单词。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> to have Excel check words that are all uppercase.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="false" />，则使 Excel 检查全部大写的单词。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, the current setting is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则使用当前设置。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to have Excel display a list of suggested alternate spellings when an incorrect spelling is found.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示当发现不正确的拼写时让 Excel 显示建议的替换拼写列表。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> to have Excel wait for you to input the correct spelling.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="false" />，则使 Excel 等待您输入正确的拼写。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, the current setting is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则使用当前设置。

trans-unit.source: The language of the dictionary being used.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的字典的语言。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoLanguageID" /> values used by the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Core.LanguageSettings.LanguageID(Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoAppLanguageID)" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 可以为 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoLanguageID" /> 属性使用的 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Core.LanguageSettings.LanguageID(Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoAppLanguageID)" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Office Excel displays the **Spelling** dialog box
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Office Excel 显示“拼写检查”对话框

trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>创建在 Microsoft Office Excel 中，此属性将返回字符串接，这等同于十六进制数字 5843454c。

trans-unit.target: 在情况下使用此属性其中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>而无需<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSourceUpdateMode%2A>指定值添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent.DataBindings%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: The name of the exported file.
trans-unit.target: 导出文件的文件名。

trans-unit.source: The language-independent name of the graphic filter as it appears in the registry under HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Shared Tools\Graphics Filters.
trans-unit.target: 出现在 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Shared Tools\Graphics 筛选器根据注册表中时与语言无关的图形过滤器名称。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display the dialog box that contains the filter-specific options.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" /> 时，显示包含筛选器特定选项的对话框。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is <see langword="false" />, Microsoft Office Excel uses the default values for the filter.
trans-unit.target: 如果此参数为 <see langword="false" />，则 Microsoft Office Excel 使用筛选器的默认值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Exports the chart in a graphic format.
trans-unit.target: 以图形格式导出图表。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.Export%2A> method to export the chart as a graphic file named Chart1.gif at the root of the C:\ directory.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.Export%2A>方法将图表作为 C:\ 目录的根目录下名为 Chart1.gif 图形文件导出。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see langword="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlFixedFormatType" /> values that specifies whether to save the chart in PDF or XPS format.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlFixedFormatType" /> 值之一，指定是以 PDF 还是 XPS 格式保存图表。

trans-unit.source: The full path of the new PDF or XPS file.
trans-unit.target: 新 PDF 或 XPS 文件的完整路径。

trans-unit.source: If you omit this parameter, Excel saves the file in the current folder.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，Excel 会将文件保存在当前文件夹中。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see langword="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlFixedFormatQuality" /> values that specifies the quality of the exported file.
trans-unit.target: 其中一个 <see langword="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlFixedFormatQuality" /> 值，该值指定导出文件的质量。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include document properties in the exported file; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要在导出的文件中包含文档属性，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to ignore any print areas set when exporting; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要在导出时忽略任何打印区域设置，请使用 <see langword="true" />；否则使用 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The number of the page at which to start exporting.
trans-unit.target: 要从其处开始导出的页码。

trans-unit.source: If this parameter is omitted, exporting starts at the beginning.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则从第一页开始导出。

trans-unit.source: The number of the last page to export.
trans-unit.target: 要导出的最后一页的页码。

trans-unit.source: If this parameter is omitted, exporting ends with the last page.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则导出完最后一页后停止导出。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to open the new file after exporting the chart; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要在导出图表后打开新文件，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A pointer to an implementation of the <see langword="IMsoDocExporter" /> interface that enables the chart to be saved in a different fixed format.
trans-unit.target: 一个指针，指向使图表能够以其他固定格式保存的 <see langword="IMsoDocExporter" /> 接口的实现。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see Extending the Office (2007) Fixed-Format Export Feature.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅“扩展 Office (2007) 固定格式导出功能”。

trans-unit.source: Saves the chart in either PDF or XPS format.
trans-unit.target: 以 PDF 或 XPS 格式保存图表。

trans-unit.source: You can save as a PDF or XPS file from Microsoft Office Excel only after you install an add-in that provides this feature.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将保存为 PDF 或 XPS 文件从 Microsoft Office Excel 仅后提供此功能的外接程序安装。

trans-unit.source: For more information, search for "Enable support for other file formats, such as PDF and XPS" on Office Online.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，搜索"启用支持对其他文件格式，例如 PDF 和 XPS"Office online。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information about optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example saves one page of the chart `Chart_1` of worksheet `Sheet1` in PDF format to the specified file path and file name using the standard quality resolution.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将保存一页的图表`Chart_1`工作表的`Sheet1`以 PDF 格式保存到指定的文件路径和文件的名称，使用标准质量分辨率。

trans-unit.source: The generated PDF file includes the workbook properties.
trans-unit.target: 生成的 PDF 文件包括工作簿属性。

trans-unit.source: To run this code example, your workbook must include a sheet named `Sheet1` with a chart named `Chart_1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，你的工作簿必须包含名为的表`Sheet1`名为图表`Chart_1`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Floor" /> object that represents the floor of the 3-D chart.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Floor" /> 对象，该对象表示三维图表的基底。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Floor" /> object that represents the floor of the 3-D chart.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Floor" /> 对象，表示三维图表的基底。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a 3-D <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.Floor%2A> property to change the color of the chart floor to green.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建一个三维<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.Floor%2A>属性来更改图表基底的颜色为绿色。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance between the data series in a 3-D chart, as a percentage of the marker width.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置三维图表中数据系列之间的距离（以标记宽度的百分比形式表示）。

trans-unit.source: The distance between the data series in a 3-D chart, as a percentage of the marker width.
trans-unit.target: 三维图表中数据系列之间的距离（以标记宽度的百分比形式表示）。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property must be between 0 and 500.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值必须介于 0 到 500 之间。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a 3-D <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> and then changes the distance between the data series to 300 percent of the marker width by using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.GapDepth%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建一个三维<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>然后将更改为使用标记宽度的 300%的数据序列之间的距离<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.GapDepth%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The X coordinate of the chart element.
trans-unit.target: 图表元素的 X 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The Y coordinate of the chart element.
trans-unit.target: 图表元素的 Y 坐标。

trans-unit.source: When the method returns, this argument contains the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlChartItem" /> value of the chart element at the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 该方法返回时，此参数包含指定坐标上的图表元素的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlChartItem" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "Remarks" section.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见“备注”部分。

trans-unit.source: When the method returns, this argument contains information related to the chart element.
trans-unit.target: 该方法返回时，此参数包含与图表元素有关的信息。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "Remarks" section.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见“备注”部分。

trans-unit.source: When the method returns, this argument contains information related to the chart element.
trans-unit.target: 该方法返回时，此参数包含与图表元素有关的信息。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "Remarks" section.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见“备注”部分。

trans-unit.source: Gets information about the chart element at specified X and Y coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 获取有关指定 X 和 Y 坐标上的图表元素的信息。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the meaning of `Arg1` and `Arg2` after the method returns.
trans-unit.target: 下表介绍的含义`Arg1`和`Arg2`该方法返回后。

trans-unit.source: Argument
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: AxisIndex
trans-unit.target: AxisIndex

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the axis is primary or secondary.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否主或辅助轴。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisGroup> constants: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisGroup.xlPrimary> or <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisGroup.xlSecondary>.
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisGroup> 常数之一：<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisGroup.xlPrimary> 或 <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisGroup.xlSecondary>。

trans-unit.source: AxisType
trans-unit.target: AxisType

trans-unit.source: Specifies the axis type.
trans-unit.target: 指定的轴类型。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisType> constants: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisType.xlCategory>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisType.xlSeriesAxis>, or <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisType.xlValue>.
trans-unit.target: 可以为以下 <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisType> 常数之一：<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisType.xlCategory>、<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisType.xlSeriesAxis> 或 <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisType.xlValue>。

trans-unit.source: DropZoneType
trans-unit.target: DropZoneType

trans-unit.source: Specifies the drop zone type: column, data, page, or row field.
trans-unit.target: 指定的拖放区域类型： 列、 数据、 页上，或行字段。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPivotFieldOrientation> constants: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPivotFieldOrientation.xlColumnField>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPivotFieldOrientation.xlDataField>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPivotFieldOrientation.xlPageField>, or <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPivotFieldOrientation.xlRowField>.
trans-unit.target: 可以是以下之一<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPivotFieldOrientation>常量： <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPivotFieldOrientation.xlColumnField>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPivotFieldOrientation.xlDataField>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPivotFieldOrientation.xlPageField>，或<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPivotFieldOrientation.xlRowField>。

trans-unit.source: The column and row field constants specify the series and category fields, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 列和行字段常量分别指定序列和类别字段。

trans-unit.source: GroupIndex
trans-unit.target: GroupIndex

trans-unit.source: Specifies the offset within the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartGroups> collection for a specific chart group.
trans-unit.target: 指定的偏移量<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartGroups>特定图表组的集合。

trans-unit.source: PivotFieldIndex
trans-unit.target: PivotFieldIndex

trans-unit.source: Specifies the offset within the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotFields> collection for a specific column (series), data, page, or row (category) field.
trans-unit.target: 指定的偏移量<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotFields>的特定列 （系列）、 数据、 页上，或行 （类别） 字段的集合。

trans-unit.source: -1 if the drop zone type is <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPivotFieldOrientation.xlDataField>.
trans-unit.target: 拖放区域类型是否为-1 <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPivotFieldOrientation.xlDataField>。

trans-unit.source: PointIndex
trans-unit.target: PointIndex

trans-unit.source: Specifies the offset within the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Points> collection for a specific point within a series.
trans-unit.target: 指定的偏移量<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Points>一系列中的特定点的集合。

trans-unit.source: A value of – 1 indicates that all data points are selected.
trans-unit.target: 值为 – 1 指示已选择所有数据点。

trans-unit.source: SeriesIndex
trans-unit.target: SeriesIndex

trans-unit.source: Specifies the offset within the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Series> collection for a specific series.
trans-unit.target: 指定的偏移量<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Series>一系列特定的集合。

trans-unit.source: ShapeIndex
trans-unit.target: ShapeIndex

trans-unit.source: Specifies the offset within the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Shapes> collection for a specific shape.
trans-unit.target: 指定的偏移量<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Shapes>特定形状的集合。

trans-unit.source: TrendlineIndex
trans-unit.target: TrendlineIndex

trans-unit.source: Specifies the offset within the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Trendlines> collection for a specific trendline within a series.
trans-unit.target: 指定的偏移量<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Trendlines>一系列中的特定趋势线的集合。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart?displayProperty=fullName> and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.GetChartElement%2A> method to display the chart element when a user clicks the chart.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart?displayProperty=fullName>，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.GetChartElement%2A>方法在用户单击图表时显示的图表元素。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a specific axis exists on the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> 控件上是否存在特定的轴。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified axis exists on the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> 上存在指定的轴，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.HasAxis%2A> property to hide or show a particular axis on a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.HasAxis%2A>属性来隐藏或显示特定轴上<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.HasAxis%2A> property is intended to be used with the following parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.HasAxis%2A>属性应与以下参数一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Parameter
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisType> values that specifies the axis type.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisType>指定轴类型的值。

trans-unit.source: Series axes apply only to 3-D charts.
trans-unit.target: 序列轴仅应用于三维图表。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisGroup> values that specifies the axis group.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlAxisGroup>指定轴组的值。

trans-unit.source: 3-D charts have only one set of axes.
trans-unit.target: 三维图表有只有一组轴。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to use <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.HasAxis%2A> without specifying parameters, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.HasAxis%2A> will get a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart._HasAxisType> object that is part of the Office development tools in Visual Studio infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.HasAxis%2A>无需指定参数，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.HasAxis%2A>将获取<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart._HasAxisType>对象属于的 Office 开发工具在 Visual Studio 基础结构和不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Office Excel may create or delete axes if you change the chart type or the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Axis.AxisGroup%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Office Excel 可以创建或删除轴，如果更改图表类型或<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Axis.AxisGroup%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.HasAxis%2A> property to hide the primary category axis of the chart.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.HasAxis%2A>属性来隐藏主类别轴的图表。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> control has a data table.

trans-unit.target: 你可以获取<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartArea>对象<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.ChartArea%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a mouse button is pressed when the pointer is over a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 当指针位于 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> 控件上，按下鼠标按钮时发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> with a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.MouseDown> event that displays the coordinates of the mouse pointer in cell D14 when the mouse button is pressed while the pointer is over the chart.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>的处理程序与<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.MouseDown>D14 单元格中显示鼠标指针的坐标，当图表上按下鼠标按钮的事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the position of the mouse pointer changes over the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 当鼠标指针的位置在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> 控件上更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> with a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.MouseMove> event that displays a message in cell D14 when the mouse moves while the pointer is over the chart.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>的处理程序与<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.MouseMove>D14 单元格中显示一条消息，当在移动鼠标指针位于图表上的事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a mouse button is released when the pointer is over the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 当指针位于 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> 控件上，释放鼠标按钮时发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> with a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.MouseUp> event that displays a message in cell D14 when the mouse button is released while the pointer is over the chart.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>的处理程序与<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.MouseUp>D14 单元格中显示一条消息，当鼠标指针位于图表上并释放鼠标按钮的事件。

trans-unit.source: The example also uses the `x` and `y` parameters of the event handler to display the coordinates of the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: 此示例还使用`x`和`y`显示鼠标指针的坐标的事件处理程序参数。

trans-unit.target: 若要将图表移到另一个工作表，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.Location%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> 控件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> 控件的名称。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> control, Excel sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.Name%2A> property to the string "*sheetname* Chart *n*", where *n* is the number of embedded charts on the worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>控制，Excel 集<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.Name%2A>到字符串的属性"*sheetname*图表* n *"，其中* n *是工作表上嵌入图表的数。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you add a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> to `Sheet1` and it is the first embedded chart on the worksheet, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.Name%2A> property will have the value `Sheet1 Chart 1`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>到`Sheet1`它并且在表上的第一个嵌入的图表<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.Name%2A>属性将具有值`Sheet1 Chart 1`。

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.Name%2A> property is read-only, you can modify a portion of the name by using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartObject.Name%2A> property of the parent <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartObject?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 尽管<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.Name%2A>属性是只读的你可以通过修改名称的一部分<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartObject.Name%2A>的父属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.ChartObject?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: The new name you specify replaces the "Chart *n*" substring in the string returned by the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 指定替换的新名称"图表* n *"返回的字符串中子字符串<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.Name%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following code changes the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.Name%2A> property value of a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> control from `Sheet1 Chart 1` to `Sheet1 SalesChart`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下面的代码更改<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.Name%2A>属性值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>控件从`Sheet1 Chart 1`到`Sheet1 SalesChart`。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the chart information to paste if a chart is on the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 如果图表位于剪贴板上，则指定要粘贴的图表信息。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPasteType" /> constants: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPasteType.xlPasteFormats" />, <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPasteType.xlPasteFormulas" />, or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPasteType.xlPasteAll" />.
trans-unit.target: 可以为以下 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPasteType" /> 常数之一：<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPasteType.xlPasteFormats" />、<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPasteType.xlPasteFormulas" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPasteType.xlPasteAll" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPasteType.xlPasteAll" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlPasteType.xlPasteAll" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the way columns or rows are used as data series on the chart.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在图表上将列或行用作数据系列的方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol" /> values: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol.xlColumns" /> or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol.xlRows" />.
trans-unit.target: 以下 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol" /> 值之一：<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol.xlColumns" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol.xlRows" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> with data plotted by columns, and then prompts the user to plot data by rows with the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.PlotBy%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>按列，绘制数据，然后提示用户按与行绘制数据<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.PlotBy%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether only visible cells are plotted.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否只绘制可见单元格。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if only visible cells are plotted.
trans-unit.target: 如果只绘制可见单元格，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> if both visible and hidden cells are plotted.
trans-unit.target: 如果可见单元格和隐藏单元格都要绘制，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of comment pages that will be printed for the current chart.
trans-unit.target: 获取要为当前图表打印的注释页的数目。

trans-unit.source: The number of comment pages that will be printed for the current chart.
trans-unit.target: 要为当前图表打印的注释页的数目。

trans-unit.source: Because charts and chart sheets do not support comments, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.PrintedCommentPages%2A> property of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> object will always return zero.
trans-unit.target: 由于图表和图表工作表不支持注释，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.PrintedCommentPages%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>对象将始终返回零。

trans-unit.source: This property appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此属性将出现在 IntelliSense Excel 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: However, this property cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.
trans-unit.target: 但是，不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is used in an Excel 2007 project.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于 Excel 2007 项目。

trans-unit.source: The number of the page at which to start printing.
trans-unit.target: 要从其处开始打印的页码。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, printing starts at the beginning.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则打印从第一页开始。

trans-unit.source: The number of the last page to print.
trans-unit.target: 要打印的最后一页的页码。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, printing ends with the last page.
trans-unit.target: 若忽略此参数，则打印至最后一页。

trans-unit.source: The number of copies to print.
trans-unit.target: 要打印的份数。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, one copy is printed.
trans-unit.target: 如果忽略此参数，则打印一份。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to have Microsoft Office Excel invoke print preview before printing the object.
trans-unit.target: 若要在打印对象前让 Microsoft Office Excel 调用打印预览，请使用 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> (or omitted) to print the object immediately.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="false" />（或省略）时，立即打印对象。

trans-unit.source: Sets the name of the active printer.
trans-unit.target: 设置活动打印机的名称。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to print to a file.
trans-unit.target: 若要打印到文件，请使用 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If <c>PrToFileName</c> is not specified, Excel prompts the user to enter the name of the output file.
trans-unit.target: 若未指定 <c>PrToFileName</c>，则 Excel 会提示用户输入输出文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to collate multiple copies.
trans-unit.target: 若逐份打印多个副本，请使用 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the file to print to.
trans-unit.target: 要打印到的文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is used only if <c>PrintToFile</c> is<see langword=" true" />.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <c>PrintToFile</c> 为 <see langword=" true" /> 时，才使用此参数。

trans-unit.source: Prints the chart.
trans-unit.target: 打印图表。

trans-unit.source: "Pages" in the descriptions of `From` and `To` refers to printed pages— not overall pages in the sheet or workbook.
trans-unit.target: "页"中的说明`From`和`To`指打印页-不是所有页中的表或工作簿。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information about optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.PrintOutEx%2A> method to print one copy of the first two pages of the chart `Chart_1` to the default printer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.PrintOutEx%2A>方法要打印一份图表的前两页`Chart_1`到默认打印机。

trans-unit.source: To run this code example, your workbook must contain a worksheet named `Sheet1` with a chart named `Chart_1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，你的工作簿必须包含名为工作表`Sheet1`名为图表`Chart_1`。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if changes can be made to the print preview window; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以更改打印预览窗口，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Shows a preview of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> control as it would look when printed.
trans-unit.target: 显示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> 控件的预览（显示打印时的外观）。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.PrintPreview%2A> method to preview the printout of the chart.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.PrintPreview%2A>方法来预览打印输出的图表。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether modification of series formulas is prevented.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否禁止修改系列公式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if series formulas cannot be modified by the user; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户不能修改系列公式，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether modification of <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> control formatting is prevented.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否禁止修改 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> 控件格式设置。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> control formatting cannot be modified by the user; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户不能修改 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> 控件格式设置，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When this property is `true`, the **Object** command on the **Format** menu is disabled, the chart type dropdown on the chart command bar and chart elements cannot be added, moved, resized, or deleted.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性是`true`、**对象**命令**格式**菜单将被禁用，无法添加图表类型下拉列表中的图表元素图表命令栏上，移动、 调整大小，或删除。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether selection of <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> control elements is prevented.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否禁止 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> 控件元素。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> control elements cannot be selected; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果不能选择 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> 控件元素，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When this property is `true`, shapes cannot be added to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> control, and the `Click` and `DoubleClick` events for <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> control elements do not occur.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性是`true`，无法将形状添加到<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>控件，与`Click`和`DoubleClick`事件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>控件元素不会发生。

trans-unit.source: Updates the cache of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Chart" /> or <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotTable" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 更新 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Chart" /> 或 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.PivotTable" /> 对象的缓存。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the size of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> control is changed.
trans-unit.target: 当更改 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> 控件的大小时发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> with a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.Resize> event that displays a message box when the chart is resized.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>的处理程序与<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.Resize>显示一个消息框，在调整图表大小时的事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> control axes are at right angles, independent of chart rotation or elevation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> 控件轴是否成直角（与图表旋转角或仰角无关）。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> control axes are at right angles, independent of chart rotation or elevation; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> 控件轴成直角（与图表旋转角或仰角无关），则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Applies only to 3-D line, column, and bar charts.
trans-unit.target: 适用于仅三维折线图、 柱形图和条形图。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `true`, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.Perspective%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为`true`、<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.Perspective%2A>忽略属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a 3-D <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> and then changes the perspective by using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.Perspective%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建一个三维<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>然后通过将更改角度<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.Perspective%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The example sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.RightAngleAxes%2A> property to `false` so that the perspective can be changed.
trans-unit.target: 该示例设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.RightAngleAxes%2A>属性`false`以便能够改动透视。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the rotation of the 3-D chart view (the rotation of the plot area around the z-axis, in degrees).
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置三维图表视图的旋转角（绘图区绕 z 轴的旋转角，以度为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The rotation of the 3-D chart view (the rotation of the plot area around the z-axis, in degrees).
trans-unit.target: 三维图表视图的旋转角（绘图区绕 z 轴的旋转角，以度为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 20.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 20。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property must be from 0 to 360, except for 3-D bar charts, where the value must be from 0 to 44.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值必须在 0 到 360 之间，但三维条形图除外（其中该值必须在 0 到 44 之间）。

trans-unit.source: Applies only to 3-D charts.
trans-unit.target: 仅适用于三维图表。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a 3-D <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> and then changes the rotation by using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.Rotation%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建一个三维<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>然后通过将更改旋转<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.Rotation%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the new chart template.
trans-unit.target: 新图表模板的名称。

trans-unit.source: Saves the current chart as a custom template in the list of available chart templates.
trans-unit.target: 将当前图表作为自定义模板保存在可用图表模板的列表中。

trans-unit.source: By default, this method saves the current chart to the user's chart template directory.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此方法将当前的图表保存到用户的图表模板目录。

trans-unit.source: If a UNC or URL is specified, the chart will be saved to the specified location instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的 UNC 或 URL，则将保存图表到指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> control is selected.
trans-unit.target: 当选择 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> 控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> with a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.SelectEvent> event that displays a message box when the primary axis of the chart is selected.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>的处理程序与<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.SelectEvent>显示一个消息框，选择图表的主轴时的事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> control data point is changed.
trans-unit.target: 当更改 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> 控件数据点的值时发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> with a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.SeriesChange> event that sets a point's border color to green when a data point of the chart is changed.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>的处理程序与<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.SeriesChange>将点的边框颜色设置为绿色，更改图表的数据点时的事件。

trans-unit.source: The name or number of the series.
trans-unit.target: 系列的名称或编号。

trans-unit.source: Gets either a single series (a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Series" /> object) or a collection of all the series (a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.SeriesCollection" /> collection) in the chart or chart group.
trans-unit.target: 获取图表或图表组中的单个系列（<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Series" /> 对象）或所有系列的集合（<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.SeriesCollection" /> 集合）。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.SeriesCollection%2A> method to add data labels to the first series in the chart.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.SeriesCollection%2A>方法将数据标签添加到图表中的第一个序列。

trans-unit.source: The name of the graphic file.
trans-unit.target: 图形文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: Sets the background graphic for <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> 控件的背景图形。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.SetBackgroundPicture%2A> method to set the background of the chart to an image file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.SetBackgroundPicture%2A>方法以设置图表背景图像文件。

trans-unit.source: A string that indicates the name of the default chart template that will be used to create new charts.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，表示在创建新图表时要使用的默认图表模板的名称。

trans-unit.source: This name can identify a chart in the gallery for a user-defined template, or it can be one of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlChartType" /> values that specifies a built-in chart template.
trans-unit.target: 该名称可以标识用户定义的模板库中的图表，它也可以是指定内置图表模板的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlChartType" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the chart template that Microsoft Office Excel uses when it creates new charts.
trans-unit.target: 指定 Microsoft Office Excel 在创建新图表时使用的图表模板的名称。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the default chart template to the line chart type.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将默认图表模板设置为线图图表类型。

trans-unit.source: Next the example adds a new chart to the active worksheet and populates its source data from a specified range on the worksheet.
trans-unit.target: 接下来的示例将新的图表添加到活动工作表，并填充工作表上指定范围中的其源数据。

trans-unit.source: To run this code example, your workbook must contain a worksheet named `Sheet1` with a chart named `Chart_1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，你的工作簿必须包含名为工作表`Sheet1`名为图表`Chart_1`。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoChartElementType" /> values that specifies the type of element modification.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoChartElementType" /> 值之一，指定元素修改的类型。

trans-unit.source: Modifies an element on the chart.
trans-unit.target: 修改图表中的元素。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.SetElement%2A> method to modify an element of the chart according to the options specified by the `Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoChartElementType` values.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.SetElement%2A>方法来修改指定的选项根据图表元素`Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoChartElementType`值。

trans-unit.source: For example, to hide the table legend, pass the value `Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoChartElementType.msoElementLegendNone` to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.SetElement%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要隐藏表图例，将值传递`Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoChartElementType.msoElementLegendNone`到<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.SetElement%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The operations you can perform by using this method correspond to the following buttons on the **Layout** tab of the Ribbon when a chart is selected:
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过使用此方法执行的操作对应于以下按钮上**布局**选项卡的功能区时选择图表：

trans-unit.source: All buttons in the **Labels** group.
trans-unit.target: 中的所有按钮**标签**组。

trans-unit.source: All buttons in the **Axes** group.
trans-unit.target: 中的所有按钮**轴**组。

trans-unit.source: All buttons in the **Analysis** group.
trans-unit.target: 中的所有按钮**分析**组。

trans-unit.source: The **Plot Area**, **Chart Wall**, and **Chart Floor** buttons in the **Background** group.
trans-unit.target: **绘图区**，**图表背景墙**，和**图表基底**按钮**后台**组。

trans-unit.source: The following code example applies the tenth layout that is available for the chart type of the `Chart_1` chart.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例应用可用于的图表类型的第 10 个布局`Chart_1`图表。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.SetElement%2A> method to apply further layout changes: setting the style of the chart title to be centered and to lie inside the chart grid area, adding a title for the horizontal axis, and adding a rotated title for the vertical axis.
trans-unit.target: 此外，该示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.SetElement%2A>方法应用更多布局更改： 设置图表标题为居中且位于图表网格区域内的样式、 添加的水平轴的标题以及添加垂直轴的旋转的标题。

trans-unit.source: To run this code example, you must add a clustered column two-dimensional chart with the name `Chart_1` to the default sheet `Sheet1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，必须将添加名为簇状的柱形二维图表`Chart_1`默认表`Sheet1`。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />。

trans-unit.source: The range that contains the source data.
trans-unit.target: 包含源数据的范围。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the way the data is to be plotted.
trans-unit.target: 指定绘制数据的方式。

trans-unit.source: Can be either of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol" /> constants: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol.xlColumns" /> or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol.xlRows" />.
trans-unit.target: 可以为以下 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol" /> 常数之一：<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol.xlColumns" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlRowCol.xlRows" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the source data range for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> 控件的源数据范围。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.SetSourceData%2A> method to set the data source of the chart to a range that contains cells A1 through B5.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Shapes" /> object that represents all the shapes on the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Shapes" /> 对象，该对象表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> 控件上的所有形状。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Shapes" /> object that represents all the shapes on the worksheet or chart sheet.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Shapes" /> 对象，表示工作表或图表工作表上的所有形状。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.Shapes%2A> property to draw a doughnut shape on the chart.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.Shapes%2A>属性以便在图表上绘制圆环图形状。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether to display all field buttons on a PivotChart.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置是否在数据透视图上显示所有字段按钮。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display all field buttons on the specified PivotChart; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要在指定的数据透视图上显示所有字段按钮，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.ShowAllFieldButtons%2A> property to `true` to display all field buttons on the specified PivotChart.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.ShowAllFieldButtons%2A>属性`true`无法在指定的数据透视图显示所有字段按钮。

trans-unit.source: Set the property to `false` to hide all field buttons.
trans-unit.target: 将属性设置为`false`若要隐藏的所有字段按钮。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.ShowAllFieldButtons%2A> property corresponds to the **Hide All** command on the **Field Buttons** drop-down list of the **Analyze** tab in Excel, which is available when a PivotChart is selected.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.ShowAllFieldButtons%2A>属性对应于**全部隐藏**命令**字段按钮**的下拉列表**分析**在 Excel 中，这是可用的选项卡选定数据透视图。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to show the data labels when the value is greater than the maximum value on the value axis.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当值大于数值轴上的最大值时是否显示数据标签。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to show the data labels when the value is greater than the maximum value on the value axis; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当值大于数值轴上的最大值时显示数据标签，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If you change the value axis in such a way that it becomes smaller than the size of the data points, you can use this property to set whether to show the data labels.
trans-unit.target: 如果你更改中变得比的数据点的大小小数值轴，你可以使用此属性设置是否显示数据标签。

trans-unit.source: This property applies to 2-D charts only.
trans-unit.target: 此属性适用于仅二维图表。

trans-unit.source: Set the property to `false` to hide the buttons.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents the side wall of a 3-D chart.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个对象，该对象表示三维图表的侧面墙。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Walls" /> object that represents the side wall of a 3-D chart.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Walls" /> 对象，表示三维图表的侧面墙。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.SideWall%2A> property to format the side wall of a 3-D chart.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.SideWall%2A>端三维图表的墙进行格式设置的属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a 3-D clustered column chart to `Sheet1` and sets its style to style 4.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加到三维簇状的柱形图`Sheet1`并设置其样式为样式 4。

trans-unit.source: The example then creates a range of arbitrary data and sets it as the chart source data.
trans-unit.target: 然后，示例创建的任意数据范围，并将其设置为图表源数据。

trans-unit.source: Next, the code specifies the colors of the chart walls and floor.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，该代码指定图表背景墙和层的颜色。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Tab" /> object for a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Tab" /> 控件的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> 对象。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Tab" /> 控件的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.Tab%2A> property to determine whether or not the color index of the tab is set to none.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.Tab%2A>属性来确定是否将选项卡的颜色索引设置为 none。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object that contains data about the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.Tag" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包含有关 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.Tag" /> 控件的数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains data about the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含有关 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart" /> 控件的数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: A common use for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.Tag%2A> property is to store data that is closely associated with the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个常见用途<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.Tag%2A>属性是与紧密关联的数据存储<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Walls" /> object that represents the walls of the 3-D chart.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Walls" /> object that represents the walls of the 3-D chart.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a 3-D <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart> and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Chart.Walls%2A> property to set the weight and color of the walls of the chart.
